Third-party licensing notice for vendored tabulate headers.

Source package:
- tabulate (https://github.com/p-ranav/tabulate)

License files included in this directory:
- tabulate-MIT.txt
- termcolor-BSD.txt
- boost-software-license-1.0.txt

Mapping:
- Most files under third_party/include/tabulate are from tabulate and are MIT-licensed.
- third_party/include/tabulate/termcolor.hpp references termcolor and BSD license.
- third_party/include/tabulate/optional_lite.hpp,
  third_party/include/tabulate/string_view_lite.hpp,
  third_party/include/tabulate/variant_lite.hpp
  are from Martin Moene "lite" libraries under Boost Software License 1.0.
